Properties
Show:
 NameDescription
onAfterSave

Event raised when save operation has finished (new and changed events have been sent and received from the server)

onCreateError

Event raised when the server responds with an error message or doesn't answer during loading the planning

onReady

Event raised when planning has been filled from the URL

onSaveError

Event raised when the server responds with an error message or doesn't answer during saving the changed events or new events

Sort events depending on them "order" property

hasChanged

Return True if an item (new, updated or deleted) needs to be sent to the server Return False if nothing has been changed since last refresh of the list (upload completed or just downloaded without any change)
